Patient Data Model Class

Source: R/TrialConstructor.R
PatientDataModel-class.Rd

Initialize a new PatientDataModel object

Add patient data to the model

Reset the trial to its initial state

Check if a dose combination is valid

Set the current dose level

Get summary statistics for each dose combination

Generate random patient data for simulation

Determine the next dose level based on admissibility rules and selection strategy

Check if any stopping criteria have been met

Get the reason for stopping the trial

Get the Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) indices

Get the Recommended Phase 2 Dose (RP2D) indices

Arguments

drugCombiObject

An object of class DrugCombination

admissibleRuleList

A list of admissibility rules

selectionStrategyList

A list of selection strategies

startingDoseLevel

The starting dose level (character)

cohortSize

The number of patients per cohort

maxCohorts

The maximum number of cohorts

outcome

The patient outcome (0 = no toxicity, 1 = toxicity)

cohort

The cohort number

doseCombination

The dose combination to validate

includeAllCombi

Logical indicating whether to include all combinations or only those with patient data

outcomeProb

Probability of toxicity for outcome generation

doseLevel

Optional dose level (defaults to current dose level)

numPatients

Optional number of patients (defaults to cohort size)

currentLevel

The current dose level

valid_dose_config

Configuration of valid doses

doseConfig

Dose configuration

drugCombiModel

Drug combination model

Value

Logical indicating if the dose combination is valid

List of summary statistics for each dose combination

Character string representing the next dose level

Logical indicating if stopping criteria have been met

Character string with stopping reason or NA if trial should continue

Numeric vector of MTD indices or NA if none found

Numeric vector of RP2D indices or NA if none found

Details

A reference class that manages patient data and trial progression in dose-finding studies. This class works with the DrugCombination-class class to track patient outcomes at different dose combinations, apply admissibility rules, and implement dose selection strategies.

Fields

drugCombi

An object of class DrugCombination-class

patientData

A data frame storing patient-level data

admissibleRule

A list of admissibility rule objects

selectionStrategy

A list of dose selection strategy objects

currentCohort

The current cohort number

currentDoseLevel

The current dose level being tested

startingDoseLevel

The starting dose level for the trial

cohortSize

The number of patients per cohort

maxCohorts

The maximum number of cohorts allowed in the trial

maxSampleSize

The maximum sample size (derived from cohortSize * maxCohorts)

See also

DrugCombination-class for the drug combination class that this model works with
